data.title: Radio Africa Group
data.meta_description: Radio Africa Group | 9,652 followers on LinkedIn. Radio Africa Group is a fast growing and dynamic media company based in Kenya consisting of 6 national radio stations, one TV station and a national newspaper.   We are the home of great and unique talent. Our media  brands include Kiss 100, Classic 105, Radio Jambo, X FM, East FM,  Smooth FM, The Star newspaper and Kiss Television.
data.text:
We are exhilarated to announce the appointment of Susan Kimachia as our new Podcast Admin. Susan will take on this role in addition to her current position as Head of Electronic News. Her extensive experience and dedication in leading our news team make her the perfect fit to oversee our podcast operations. #WeAreRadioAfricaLimited

Somoina Kimojino is our Group Events Manager, and she's the dynamic force behind organizing and executing some of our most memorable events. With a keen eye for detail and an exceptional knack for multitasking, Somoina ensures that every event, from intimate gatherings to large-scale conferences, runs smoothly and meets our high standards of excellence. #WeAreRadioAfricaGroup. #RadioAfricaEvents

Celebrating 24 Years of Vision and Leadership. After 24 incredible years at the helm of Radio Africa Group, our esteemed CEO Patrick Quarcoo is bidding us farewell as he embarks on a new chapter of life. He started this journey with just one radio station and has since grown our company to encompass six radio stations, leading newspaper publisher and a number of digital outlets shaping both the political and media landscapes in our country. Under his guidance, Radio Africa Group has not only thrived but has also become a cornerstone of the community impact, touching the lives of countless citizens through job opportunities and meaningful contributions. In honoring Patrick Quarcoo's remarkable legacy and unwavering dedication to Radio Africa Group we celebrated him at a heartfelt farewell party as we express our gratitude and best wishes in his future endeavors. #24YearsOfGreatness #WeAreRadioAfrica
